title: Vehicle Compatibility
description: Schema for defining vehicle compatibility for spare parts.

brand.description: The brand of the vehicle (e.g., BMW, Mercedes).

model.description: The model of the vehicle (e.g., 3 Series, C-180).

yearRange.description: The manufacturing year range of the vehicle (e.g., 2020-2023).

engine.description: The engine type and size (e.g., 1.6 TDI, 2.0 Petrol).

transmission.description: The transmission type of the vehicle.

fuel.description: The fuel type of the vehicle.

oemCodes.description: A list of OEM codes associated with this vehicle model.
